org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov.dao

Interface ProvInstancePriceRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ProvInstancePrice,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ProvInstancePrice,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ProvInstancePrice,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ProvInstancePrice>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ProvInstancePrice,java.lang.Integer>, org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<ProvInstancePrice,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface ProvInstancePriceRepository
extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<ProvInstancePrice,java.lang.Integer>
    ProvInstancePrice repository.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        @Query(value="FROM #{#entityName} WHERE location.name = :location AND type.node.id = :node")
java.util.List<ProvInstancePrice> findAll(java.lang.String node,
                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String location)
        Return all ProvInstancePrice related to given node and within a specific location.
        Parameters:
        node - The node (provider) to match.
        location - The expected location name. Case sensitive.
        Returns:
        The filtered ProvInstancePrice.

      • findLowestPrice

        @Query(value="SELECT ip, ip.cost * CASE WHEN t.period > 60 THEN 100 ELSE :rate END AS rateCost FROM #{#entityName} ip INNER JOIN FETCH ip.type AS i INNER JOIN FETCH ip.term AS t LEFT JOIN ip.location AS loc WHERE (:node = i.node.id OR :node LIKE CONCAT(i.node.id,\':%\')) AND (:type IS NULL OR i.id = :type) AND i.cpu>= :cpu AND i.ram>=:ram AND (:os IS NULL OR ip.os=:os) AND (:constant IS NULL OR i.constant = :constant) AND (:term IS NULL OR t.id = :term) AND i.cpu > 0 AND (:ephemeral IS TRUE OR t.ephemeral = :ephemeral) AND (:location IS NULL OR loc IS NULL OR loc.name = :location)                                         ORDER BY rateCost ASC")
java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> findLowestPrice(java.lang.String node,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               double cpu,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               int ram,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Boolean constant,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               VmOs os,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer term,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer type,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               boolean ephemeral,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String location,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               double rate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Return the lowest instance price configuration from the minimal requirements.
        Parameters:
        node - The node linked to the subscription. Is a node identifier within a provider.
        cpu - The minimum CPU.
        ram - The minimum RAM in MB.
        constant - The optional constant CPU behavior constraint.
        os - The requested OS.
        term - The optional pricing term identifier. May be null.
        type - The optional instance type identifier. May be null.
        ephemeral - When true, ephemeral contract is accepted. Otherwise (false), only non ephemeral instance are accepted.
        location - Optional location name. May be null.
        rate - Usage rate. Positive number. Maximum is 1, minimum is 0.01.
        pageable - The page control to return few item.
        Returns:
        The minimum instance price or null.

      • findLowestCustomPrice

        @Query(value="SELECT ip FROM #{#entityName} ip INNER JOIN FETCH ip.type AS i INNER JOIN FETCH ip.term AS t LEFT JOIN ip.location AS loc WHERE (:node = i.node.id OR :node LIKE CONCAT(i.node.id,\':%\')) AND i.cpu = 0 AND ip.os=:os AND (:constant IS NULL OR i.constant = :constant) AND (:term IS NULL OR t.id = :term)                                                           AND (:location IS NULL OR loc IS NULL OR loc.name = :location)                                ORDER BY ip.cost ASC           ")
java.util.List<ProvInstancePrice> findLowestCustomPrice(java.lang.String node,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.Boolean constant,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             VmOs os,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.Integer term,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String location,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Return the lowest custom instance price configuration from the minimal requirements.
        Parameters:
        node - The requested provider node.
        constant - The optional constant CPU behavior constraint.
        os - The requested OS.
        term - The optional pricing term identifier. May be null.
        location - Optional location name. May be null.
        pageable - The page control to return few item.
        Returns:
        The minimum instance price or null.
